text: Michael Praed .Without doubt the most successful and influential re - telling of the Robin Hood myth in more recent times was HTV 's Robin of Sherwood .The writer of this series Richard Carpenter cleverly blended together elements of ancient pagan mysticism and folklore and created a gritty , realistic and hugely successful re - telling of the ancient legend for television .It soon became a firm favorite of mine .Paul Knight of Goldcrest and Richard Carpenter had seen Michael Praed in a West End production of The Pirates of Penzance in 1982 .His real name was Michael Prince , but chose the old Cornish name ' Praed ' ( meadow ) , because another actor was already listed with that name in Equity .

Robin of Sherwood was first shown on Saturday April 28th 1984 and went on to attain cult status and ran up until 1986 .Praed played Robin of Loxley for the first two series then left leafy Sherwood for Broadway , later taking on the role as the Prince of Moldavia in the American TV series Dynasty .The third season had Praed replaced by Jason Connery ( son of Sean who had played an older Robin Hood in 1976 ) as a reincarnation of the outlaw , Robert of Huntingdon .I will be looking at this series in greater depth in the future .

How does it compare to the latest BBC version ?Follow On Twitter .A Blog about a Film and a Legend ." It has always been my hope that our fairy - tale films will result in a desire of viewers to read again the fine , old original tales and enchanting myths on the home bookshelf or school library .Our motion picture productions are designed to augment them , not supplant them . Code Of Silence with Chuck Norris 70 .Bad Boys 1 and 2 with Will Smith and Martin Lawrence 71 .The Package with Steve Austin and Dolph Lundgren 72 .One In The Chamber with Cuba Gooding Jr and Dolph Lundgren 73 .The Untouchables with Kevin Costner , Robert Deniro , Sean Connery , Andy Garcia 74 .Recoil with Steve Austin and Danny Trejo 75 .Death Sentence with Kevin Bacon .Tekunique , you liked Metro with Eddie Murphy , Michael Rappaport , Carmen Ejogo ?You 're one of the few people besides me who liked that movie .

I like the scene when Eddie goes to prison to visit the bad guy and he 's cursing a lot at the bad guy .Eddie said you do n't give a fuck .I do n't give a fuck .Fuck you LOL .You try me muthafucka LOL .Bad guy said to Eddie that he does n't give a fuck about nothing especially a nigga cop who 's interfering with my money LOL .Carmen Ejogo looked good in this .I liked the outfit she wore when Eddie took her to dinner at a restaurant .

I see you mentioned Cop Out also with Bruce Willis and Tracy Morgan .I would n't really consider that a action movie because it was n't a lot of action and Tracy is too silly .Tracy 's wife in the movie is Quincy Jones daughter .I think her name is Rashida Jones and she 's hot .I also see you mentioned Gang Related movie with 2Pac , James Belushi , Lela Rochon .That movie sucked and it was n't a lot of action .Lela was looking good .The soundtrack is better than the movie LOL .

I never saw it and i did n't wanna see it .I saw previews for the remake and i do n't wanna see that either .Since you saw Gang Related and i 'm guessing you like James Belushi , check out his Red Heat movie with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Larry Fishburne .That 's good and he also did a good movie with Lou Gossett Jr and Rae Dawn Chong called The Principal .He was a high school principal at a black and hispanic ghetto school .Michael Wright was also in it as the leader of a gang and drug dealer .

In one scene , they were arguing because James found out about Michael almost killing one of his friends that was in a gang with him and Michael said fuck you and James said no and he screamed fuck you LOL .Michael got pissed and he said fuck you muthafucka .I 'll kill you and if you come back to school tomorrow , you 're gon na be in a bodybag .You here me fucker ?LOL .Michael is a good actor .He was in The Five Heartbeats with Robert Townsend and Leon .He was the lead singer in the group .

He 's a ugly dude LOL .Since i talked about Metro movie with Eddie Murphy and Carmen Ejogo that you liked , you should check out Carmen in Pride And Glory with Edward Norton and Colin Farrell .That 's a good action / drama movie .Edward and Colin are brothers and they 're cops except Colin is a dirty cop .Carmen is Edward 's ex - wife .She 's also in The Brave One with Jodie Foster and Terrence Howard .She had a very small part as Terrence 's ex - wife and i was kinda mad that she did n't have a bigger part because i like looking at her because she 's beautiful .

Sparkle is the remake of 70 's version with Lonette McKee and Philip Michael Thomas who played on Miami Vice tv show .Carmen was really looking hot in Sparkle .Tekunique , i remember you asking me if i liked Judge Dredd with Sylvester Stallone and Diane Lane .I never saw it and i did n't wanna see it .I saw previews for the remake and i do n't wanna see that either .i do nt understand how you ve never / dont want to see Judge Dredd , seems to me you re a Stallone fan .

i watched it in the theatre when it first came out and at the time had no idea it was based on a comic .recently prior to watching the newly remake " Dredd " , i was researching about the Stallone version and found out it did not stay true to the comic and has gotten negative reviews from the comic fans . that said , i still think it was a good action movie .the NEW Dredd however is fucking AWESOME . much better than the Stallone version and going by the fans it stays tru to the comic book .

one of the best i ve seen in recent years .i do nt know what your reason is for not wanting to checkout the Dredd movies [ Stallone 's & the recent re - boot ] but i recommend checking both of em out for yourself .Since you saw Gang Related and i 'm guessing you like James Belushi , check out his Red Heat movie with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Larry Fishburne .That 's good and he also did a good movie with Lou Gossett Jr and Rae Dawn Chong called The Principal .LMAO its funny you assume i like James Belushi and start breaking down his filmography haha .

2Pac was on point in that , [ his final movie while alive ] and i thought Dennis Quaid gave a good performance as well . and speaking of Belushi , Red Heat was def . on point . kind of a slept on joint imo .Since i talked about Metro movie with Eddie Murphy and Carmen Ejogo that you liked , you should check out Carmen in Pride And Glory with Edward Norton and Colin Farrell .That 's a good action / drama movie .I also saw her in Sparkle with Mike Epps , Jordin Sparks , Derek Luke , Omari Hardwick .

Carmen was really looking hot in Sparkle .Pride & Glory was good but not on the level of another NY Police action / drama flick , Brooklyn 's Finest .Snipes shines in it and had good chemistry with Don Cheadle . have nt seen Sparkle but i 'd like to checkout the original 70s version .Rashida Jones is fucking smokin ! !i got into The Office just because of her .lol .whatever happend to Theresa Randall ? damn she was so hot .... there needs to be more hot black actresses gettin good roles .

There are some movies of his that suck like Avenging Angelo with Madeline Stowe and Anthony Quinn , Stop Or My Mom Will Shoot(LOL@movie title ) , Rambo 3 and Daylight .He did a couple of straight to video movies called Eye See You and Shade that you should check out .Shade is n't a action flick .It 's a drama flick about gambling .Some good actors in that like Gabriel Byrne , Thandie Newton , Jamie Foxx , Melanie Griffith .Avenging Angelo was also straight to video .I saw Brooklyn 's Finest and i liked it .

LOL .She 's cute and she was in Tyler Perry 's Madea 's Big Happy Family movie .Have you seen The Brave One with Jodie Foster and Terrence Howard ?Carmen Ejogo has a very small part as Terrence 's ex - wife .I like how Jodie was a vigilante shooting bad guys LOL .Yeah Rashida Jones is cute and so is her sister Kidada Jones who used to be 2Pac 's woman .I do n't know what happened to Theresa Randle .You remember the sexy outfit she wore in Bad Boys 2 when her and Martin Lawrence were at their house while Gabrielle Union and Will Smith were there ?

Mari Morrow is hotter than Theresa Randle .Mari is very cute and lightskin .She was in How To Be A Player with Bill Bellamy and Bernie Mac .She was the friend of Bill 's sister and Bill fucked her at the end but she played him because she wrote busted adapt on his refrigerator and his woman Lark Voorhies saw it hahahahahahahahahahaha .She was also in Today You Die with Steven Seagal and Treach of Naughty By Nature .That 's a good action flick .She was Steven 's woman which surprised me .I would n't mind seeing more cute black women in action movies but that 's probably not gon na happen .
